name: Flood Gates
description:
A short Puzzlescript game about doors, keys and turning things pink.

Made in a few hours for the Australian Global Game Jam Online 2022 (and it will likely receive an update).

Made using  Pancelor's level select fork for Puzzlescript. 

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 
  • ESC exits to the level select or menu
  • M is mute
